tool_description: An API showing USD to EGP Exchange Rates in all Egyptian banks
name: USD to EGP Live
title: USD to EGP Live

api_list.name: /currency
api_list.description: this endpoint will return back all USD Exchange Rates to EGP from all Egyptian banks
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://usd-to-egp-live.p.rapidapi.com/currency"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "usd-to-egp-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://usd-to-egp-live.p.rapidapi.com/currency"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "usd-to-egp-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
